snippet: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation announced they would give the money for emergency operations and to help develop drugs or vaccines.
abstract: Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation commits $50 million to the fight against Ebola in West Africa, largest sum it has ever committed to one outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The Bill & Melinda Gates Foundation announced they would give the money for emergency operations and to help develop drugs or vaccines.

headline.main: Gates Foundation Pledges $50 Million to Fight Ebola
headline.print_headline: Gates Foundation Pledges $50 Million to Fight Ebola
